name: yummly
description: Yummly is the world’s largest and most powerful recipe search site and understands the recipe – ingredients, diets, allergies, nutrition, taste, techniques & more – so Yummly can connect you with the best recipes.  The Yummly API gives programmatic access to Yummly functionality.
